subject: SimSon
description_text:
Hi,

We are Wilson Impex, manufacturers of Karting Gloves, Sim Racing Gloves, Rib Protectors, and Neck Protectors, including FIA Homologation 2018 approved gloves.

Our products meet BSCI, Sedex, ISO, and CE standards, ensuring top quality for professional and amateur racers alike. We offer OEM, custom designs, and competitive bulk pricing.

Let’s connect to discuss how we can support your racing gear requirements.

Best regards,

Muhammad Farhan
Senior Merchandiser
Wilson Impex
